name: Cubyz
description:
Cubyz is a new 3D voxel sandbox. Even still being in development, the game already features many things like infinite worlds, a (not finished) save/load system and some other things. The game is also open-source (under BSD-3 license) and source available on github.

Don't hesitate to share your builds screenshots or propose new games features on the community wall or the discord server! We'll be happy to see yours!
